question: All Parties Conference in Bombay on 19th May 1928 was presided over by who of the following?
explanation: The Secretary of State for India Lord Birkenhead criticized Indians on the issue of drafting the Constitution. In the year 1927, the Madras Conference of Indian National Congress adopted a resolution to draft a Constitution with consent from all parties. For that reason, all Parties Conference was organized in Bombay on 19th May and it was presided over by the Muslim leader M.A. Ansari.
